Class Checks

Checks
public class Checks extends Object
Contains static methods that are used Throughout the program.

  • Method Details

    • genBuildType

      public static String genBuildType(Scanner input)
      Gets user input and checks if is of the right format and returns the formatted input.
      Parameters:
      input - a scanner object.
      Returns:
      the building type (House, Apartment, Store).
      See Also:
      • formatString(String)

    • getFee

      public static int getFee(String buildType)
      Gets a string that has the building type and returns the fee depending on the building type.
      Parameters:
      buildType - building type.
      Returns:
      cost of the building.

    • checkPayment

      public static int checkPayment(String subject, int fee, Scanner input)
      Gets input form the user until an appropriate value is entered. value is then converted to integer and sent back.
      Parameters:
      subject - String that is to be printed.
      fee - total cost of the project.
      input - scanner object to get user input.
      Returns:
      the amount paid to date.

    • checkTeleNo

      public static String checkTeleNo(Scanner input)
      Takes user input until a valid telephone number is entered. Returns the checked number.
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner to take user input.
      Returns:
      checked telephone number.

      input - Scanner object to take user inputs.

    • formatDate

      public static Date formatDate(String subject, Scanner input)
      Asks users to enter a date until a valid date format is entered. This input is then formatted into a proper date format and returned.
      Parameters:
      subject - string to be printed.
      input - Scanner object to take user inputs.
      Returns:
      the formatted date.

    • stringDate

      public static String stringDate(Date date)
      Takes a date object and returns the string version of the date.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      formatted string version of the date.

    • getDate

      public static Date getDate()
      Returns the formatted Date object of todays date.
      Returns:
      Todays date in SQL date format.

    • checkName

      public static String checkName(String subject, Scanner input)
      Takes input until a proper first name and surname is entered. The name is formatted and returned.

      Checks if the input is empty.
      Checks if both first name and surname is entered.
      Checks to make sure no middle name or anything else is not entered.

      Parameters:
      subject - string to be printed.
      input - Scanner object to take user inputs.
      Returns:
      the formatted name.
      See Also:
      • charCount(String, int, char)
      • formatName(String)

    • charCount

      public static int charCount(String name, int index, char checkChar)
      Counts the number of non leading of tailing '/s' characters using recursion.
      Parameters:
      name - string value that is being checked.
      index - index of the '/s' character in 'name'.
      checkChar - character to count in 'name'.
      Returns:
      the total number of occurrence of the character '/s' in string 'name'

    • formatName

      public static String formatName(String name)
      Formats a name so that the leading letter of the first name and surname are both capital.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the person.
      Returns:
      formatted name.

    • formatString

      public static String formatString(String string)
      Formats a string to have the first letter capitalised.
      Parameters:
      string - sent string.
      Returns:
      formatted string.
